verses.verse: "Now this <S%H2088><s%> is what <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them to consecrate <S%H6942><s%> them to minister <S%H3547><s%> as priests <S%H3547><s%> to Me: take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish, <S%H8549><s%>

and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> spread <S%H4886><s%> with oil; <S%H8081><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them of fine <S%H5560><s%> wheat <S%H2406><s%> flour. <S%H5560><s%>

"And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> them in one <S%H259><s%> basket, <S%H5536><s%> and present <S%H7126><s%> them in the basket <S%H5536><s%> along with the bull <S%H6499><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>

"Then you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%> the tunic <S%H3801><s%> and the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> and the ephod <S%H646><s%> and the breastpiece, <S%H2833><s%> and gird <S%H640><s%> him with the skillfully <S%H2805><s%> woven <S%H2805><s%> band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod; <S%H646><s%>
and you shall set <S%H7660><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> on the turban. <S%H4701><s%>
"Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> it on his head <S%H7218><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> him.
"And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> tunics <S%H3801><s%> on them.

"And you shall gird <S%H2296><s%> them with sashes, <S%H73><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and bind <S%H2280><s%> caps <S%H4021><s%> on them, and they shall have <S%H1961><s%> the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute. <S%H2708><s%> So you shall ordain <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

"Then you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bull. <S%H6499><s%>
"And you shall slaughter <S%H7819><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> [it] on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> with your finger; <S%H676><s%> and you shall pour <S%H8210><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the entrails <S%H7130><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, and offer <S%H6999><s%> them up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

"But the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> and its hide <S%H5785><s%> and its refuse, <S%H6569><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> it is a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering. <S%H9128><s%>

"You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram; <S%H352><s%>
and you shall slaughter <S%H7819><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> and shall take <S%H3947><s%> its blood <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

"Then you shall cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into its pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> its entrails <S%H7130><s%> and its legs, <S%H3767><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> [them] with its pieces <S%H5409><s%> and its head. <S%H7218><s%>

"And you shall offer <S%H6999><s%> up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> on the altar; <S%H4196><s%> it is a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> to the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> it is a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>

"And you shall slaughter <S%H7819><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of its blood <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> [it] on the lobe <S%H8571><s%> of Aaron's right ear <S%H241><s%> and on the lobes <S%H8571><s%> of his sons' right <S%H3233><s%> ears <S%H241><s%> and on the thumbs <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> and on the big <S%H931><s%> toes <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> feet, <S%H7272><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the [rest of the] blood <S%H1818><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

"Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is on the altar <S%H4196><s%> and some <S%H4480><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> [it] on Aaron <S%H175><s%> and on his garments, <S%H899><s%> and on his sons <S%H1121><s%> and on his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments <S%H899><s%> with him; so he and his garments <S%H899><s%> shall be consecrated, <S%H6942><s%> as well as his sons and his sons' garments <S%H899><s%> with him.

"You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> from the ram <S%H352><s%> and the fat <S%H451><s%> tail, <S%H451><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the entrails <S%H7130><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> (for it is a ram <S%H352><s%> of ordination <S%H4394><s%>),

and one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> [mixed with] oil <S%H8081><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> wafer <S%H7550><s%> from the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H4682><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is [set] before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%>

and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H3605><s%> in the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and in the hands <S%H3709><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them as a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> them from their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and offer <S%H6999><s%> them up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> on the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> it is an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of Aaron's ram <S%H352><s%> of ordination, <S%H4394><s%> and wave <S%H5130><s%> it as a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be your portion. <S%H4490><s%>

"And you shall consecrate <S%H6942><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the wave <S%H8573><s%> offering <S%H8573><s%> and the thigh <S%H7785><s%> of the heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was waved <S%H5130><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> was offered <S%H7311><s%> from the ram <S%H352><s%> of ordination, <S%H4394><s%> from the one which <S%H834><s%> was for Aaron <S%H175><s%> and from the one which <S%H834><s%> was for his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

"And it shall be for Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> as [their] portion <S%H2706><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for it is a heave <S%H8641><s%> offering; <S%H8641><s%> and it shall be a heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, <S%H8002><s%> [even] their heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be for his sons <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, that in them they may be anointed <S%H4886><s%> and ordained. <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

"For seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the one of his sons <S%H1121><s%> who is priest <S%H3548><s%> in his stead <S%H8478><s%> shall put <S%H3847><s%> them on when <S%H834><s%> he enters <S%H935><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place.
"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of ordination <S%H4394><s%> and boil <S%H1310><s%> its flesh <S%H1320><s%> in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

"And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the ram, <S%H352><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket, <S%H5536><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

"Thus they shall eat <S%H398><s%> those things by which <S%H834><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> was made <S%H3722><s%> at their ordination <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> [and] consecration; <S%H6942><s%> but a layman <S%H2114><s%> shall not eat <S%H398><s%> [them,] because <S%H3588><s%> they are holy. <S%H6944><s%>

"And if <S%H518><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of ordination <S%H4394><s%> or any <S%H4480><s%> of the bread <S%H3899><s%> remains <S%H3498><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> morning, <S%H1242><s%> then you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> the remainder <S%H3498><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> it shall not be eaten, <S%H398><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is holy. <S%H6944><s%>

"And thus <S%H3602><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; you shall ordain <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> them through seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"And each day <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a bull <S%H6499><s%> as a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> for atonement, <S%H3725><s%> and you shall purify <S%H2398><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> when you make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it; and you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> it to consecrate <S%H6942><s%> it.

"For seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the altar <S%H4196><s%> and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> it; then the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> [and] whatever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be holy. <S%H6942><s%>

"Now this <S%H2088><s%> is what <S%H834><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> each day, <S%H3117><s%> continuously. <S%H8548><s%>

"The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at twilight; <S%H6153><s%>

and there [shall be] one-tenth <S%H259><s%> [of an ephah] of fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with one-fourth of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and one-fourth of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a libation <S%H5262><s%> with one lamb. <S%H3532><s%>

"And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at twilight, <S%H6153><s%> and shall offer <S%H6213><s%> with it the same grain offering <S%H4503><s%> as the morning <S%H1242><s%> and the same libation, <S%H5262><s%> for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"It shall be a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you, to speak <S%H1696><s%> to you there. <S%H8033><s%>
"And I will meet <S%H3259><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and it shall be consecrated <S%H6942><s%> by My glory. <S%H9202><s%>

"And I will consecrate <S%H6942><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar; <S%H4196><s%> I will also consecrate <S%H6942><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to minister <S%H3547><s%> as priests <S%H3547><s%> to Me.
"And I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and will be their God. <S%H430><s%>

"And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that I might dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>
